BEGIN TRANSACTION SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON SET ARITHABORT ON SET NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT OFF SET CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL ON SET ANSI_NULLS ON SET ANSI_PADDING ON SET ANSI_WARNINGS ON COMMIT BEGIN TRANSACTION GO CREATE TABLE dbo.Tmp_rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators ( id int NOT NULL IDENTITY (28, 1), name nvarchar(50) NOT NULL, aggregateType nvarchar(10) NOT NULL, measureName nvarchar(50) NULL, bkgName nvarchar(50) NULL ) ON [PRIMARY] GO ALTER TABLE dbo.Tmp_rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators SET (LOCK_ESCALATION = TABLE) GO SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.Tmp_rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators ON GO IF EXISTS(SELECT * FROM dbo.rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators) EXEC('INSERT INTO dbo.Tmp_rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators (id, name, aggregateType, measureName, bkgName) SELECT id, name, aggregateType, measureName, bkgName FROM dbo.rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators WITH (HOLDLOCK TABLOCKX)') GO SET IDENTITY_INSERT dbo.Tmp_rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators OFF GO ALTER TABLE dbo.kpi_Matrix DROP CONSTRAINT FK_Matrix_Indicators GO DROP TABLE dbo.rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators GO EXECUTE sp_rename N'dbo.Tmp_rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators', N'rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators', 'OBJECT' GO ALTER TABLE dbo.rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators ADD CONSTRAINT pk_ByPeriods_Indicators PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ( id ) WITH( STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
GO COMMIT BEGIN TRANSACTION GO ALTER TABLE dbo.kpi_Matrix ADD CONSTRAINT FK_Matrix_Indicators FOREIGN KEY ( indicator_id ) REFERENCES dbo.rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators ( id ) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE NO ACTION
GO ALTER TABLE dbo.kpi_Matrix SET (LOCK_ESCALATION = TABLE) GO COMMIT
